data.name: The Block Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Block is a bite sized experience for city builder fans short on time / money / attention / all of the above. Each level is slightly different and can be completed in a matter of minutes. This demo is a short timed version to give you a quick taste of what The Block will offer when it launches later this year.

Like my last project The Ramp, The Block is designed more as a ‘digital toy’ than a game: a short, satisfying experience that’ll make your day a little bit better and costs less than a slice of pizza.

CHOOSE from a variety of levels and sizes!
CREATE a tiny city block from randomly generated parts!
BASK in the glory of your adorable creation!

Thanks for checking out my page! If you have any questions or feedback, I’m all ears.

data.short_description: A short, timed demo for The Block, a minimalist city building toy. Place randomly generated buildings on a square and watch your tiny city block come to life!
